attributes.action: Threshold based EU referendum to heal bitter divisions from last EU referendum
attributes.background:
The controversial and misleading statements in the last EU referendum and subsequent Brexit talks have caused deep and bitter 
 national divisions. There is a need for a clear threshold based new referendum with 10% majority so it is considered decisive and conclusive

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not sure exactly what you mean by "a clear threshold based new referendum with 10% majority". 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
